# tcs.core Module Documentation

This directory contains auto-generated PowerShell documentation for the **tcs.core** module, generated using [PlatyPS](https://github.com/PowerShell/platyPS).

## Documentation Structure

- **Function Reference** - Markdown files for each exported function
- **About Help** - Overview and module information
- **External Help** - Compiled MAML XML help files (for offline help in PowerShell)

## Generated By

The documentation in this directory is automatically generated from PowerShell comment-based help by the GitHub Actions workflow: [`.github/workflows/generate-docs.yml`](../.github/workflows/generate-docs.yml)

## Manual Changes

⚠️ **Do not manually edit files in this directory** - they will be overwritten on the next documentation generation run. Instead, update the PowerShell comment-based help in the source files.

## Related Resources

- [tcs.core Module on PowerShell Gallery](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/tcs.core/)
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/ntatschner/TheCodeSaiyan-PowerShell-tcs.core)
- [PlatyPS Documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/platyPS)
